body.p: I concur in the Petition which will be provided to you, for the relief of the sureties of Williams in those judgements upon forfeited recoginzances, rendered at the present Special Criminal Term of the Madison Circuit Court. At the time they entered as surety, no one had a right to anticipate Williams escape -- His interesting & destitute family need all that can be saved from creditors. I am satisfied the sureties have endeavored in good faith to procure his recapture

Very Truly Yours
W C Goodloe
Judge 13th Jud. District.

His Excellency
Beriah Magoffin
Frankfort
Ky
